items.sentence: Only Tom would have the guts to do that kind of thing.
Tom could have dealt with the problem in a better way.
I don\'t think that this shirt goes with that red tie.
Why don\'t we think about this for another week or so?
Why don\'t you come over and eat with us this evening?
You need to take responsibility for what you\'ve done.
Are you seriously thinking about selling this on eBay?
We can\'t do anything until we get back to the office.
They rented the room on the second floor to a student.
Tom looked like he was somewhere in his late thirties.
